title: "AI Can Make Education More Personal (Yes, Really)"
excerpt: "Both research and experience tell us that in most times and places, education has been a social and interpersonal process. And teachers are the most fundamental element of that process. To put it simply, teachers are irreplaceable, even in the age of wondrous chatbots."
